short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows user to secretely see his facebook messages without clicking on it. Go to your FB messenger and click on the plugin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The goal is to see entirely your messages without inform people that you have seen it.
Go to https://www.facebook.com/messages/ and click on our extension.
